ygData.subject: RE: Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: Trains in Sol-B?? I have been there for about a week or 2 on and off now - learning the place (I can find pool room, window room, nobel room and the king room,
ygData.messageBody:
Trains in Sol-B?? I have been there for about a week or 2 on and off now -
learning the place (I can find pool room, window room, nobel room and the
king room, I can prolly stumble into the bat rooms to but am not confident
looking in there. Anyhow, our Sol-B is crowded as hell and a doggy's
(greater kobolds as they are affectionately known ;p) life is about 4
seconds. There are pullers running through the place like mad. It's like
HighKeep all over again <sheesh> spawn stealers, whiners, waiting lists for
rooms, etc. etc. Trains are only very occasional.

Well, that is during prime time playing hours! hehe - try going there first
thing Sunday morning. Zone in and 3 GK's are guarding the foyer - ugh. You
finally band together with who ever is in the outter hall and clear the
entry point. Woo hoo this feels pretty cool. Think about how this place was
when the first wave of players arrived. How'd ya like to fight here in
banded armor? Hehe - guess that an army of dwarfs were the first ones in
since they could get small bronze in Unrest. (Medium bronze drops in Sol-B
and on a young server loads were prolly still in banded when the first wave
hit.)

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Bobby [mailto:merlin26@...]
Sent: Monday, December 27, 1999 12:49 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bug warning! Angstlich's
Appalling Screech

From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>

I practically live in sol b and the trains are sometimes
pretty bad so
I use screach fairly often.

Tuldar 42 bard Tarew Marr
